name: Sinopa
description:
What is Sinopa?

Sinopa is a aracade-cabinet built game that implies spirituality, and the power of friendship and loyalty, while having an unusual, but appealing art aesthetic. The player becomes the Spirit Guide Sinopa who destined to save his other Spirit Animal companions from an evil shaman who has turned them all into evil apparations. The goal is to fight away the dark spirits that haunt the surrounding lands, and free Sinopa's friends in a brawl-beat-'em-up style.
